title: Why
body:
So I was playing a game of League and I was loading in when suddenly it says "You've lost connection to the internet try again" 

So the second time I try and make it in

Just as my team is remaking

And I get 20 minute leave busters for something I couldn't control

How is this fair at all.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having issues staying connected to the game servers, but we have a couple steps that can help fix this up.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this, and making sure to review each step.  Keep in mind that Leaverbuster treats all leaves equally regardless of intent, because they still cause others a negative experience.  This should get you back in game!
